page.title: 01The Village of Dinas, Dyfed
page.content:
{Dinas}is a small village by the sea in between {Fishguard }and {Newport } in{Dyfed}.On the land side of{Dinas } there is a range of hills and on the sea side there is Island Farm which is surrounded by water. { {} In{Dinas}there are a few shops,a garage,a primary school,a blacksmith,a church,three chapels,and four pubs. There are about fifty children in the school and we are very lucky to have a playing field next door to the school and sometimes during our dinner break we go out there to play.
There are lots of different types of houses in{Dinas.}There are modern houses,bungalows,cottages,and farm houses.
{Eifion Thomas,Smithfield,Dinas
